plot: Gosick is set in a fictional European country in the 1920s. Kazuya Kujo is a transfer student to St. Marguerite Academy,a place where myths and superstitions are abundant. There he meets Victorique, a mysterious, yet highly intelligent girl   Written by  Mattias1
plot_en: Gosick is set in a fictional European country in the 1920s. Kazuya Kujo is a transfer student to St. Marguerite Academy,a place where myths and superstitions are abundant. There he meets Victorique, a mysterious, yet highly intelligent girl   Written by  Mattias1
plot_es: Gosick is set in a fictional European country in the 1920s. Kazuya Kujo is a transfer student to St. Marguerite Academy,a place where myths and superstitions are abundant. There he meets Victorique, a mysterious, yet highly intelligent girl   Written by  Mattias1
title: Gosick
